query: 如图,▱ABCD中,EF过对角线的交点O,AB=10,AD=6,OF=3,则四边形BCEF的周长为()选项：['16', '19', '22', '32']
answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD=4,AD=BC=3,AB∥CD,OA=OC,∴∠CEO=∠AFO,∠ECO=∠FAO,在△ECO和△FAO中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠ECO=∠FAO\\CO=AO\\∠EOC=∠FOA\\\end{matrix}\right.\,∴△ECO≌△FAO(ASA),∴AF=CE,OE=OF=3,∴EF=6,∴四边形BCEF的周长为:BC+CE+EF+BF=BC+AF+BF+EF=BC+AB+EF=10+6+6=22．故选:C．
